channel.title: Pacts in Trophy Gold
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog @darren introduces Pacts for *Trophy Gold*-- a mechanic that lets treasure-hunters negotiate and enter into dangerous pacts—a mystically binding relationship that transfers some of the pact-maker’s power to the treasure-hunter— with beings who hold more power in the world than the treasure-hunters will ever be able to.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/pacts-in-trophy-gold The Gauntlet Blog Index: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog-table-of-contents.html
